instruction: Create a bulleted list of the benefits of automatic cars.
output:
The benefits of automatic cars are as follows:
- Reduced stress since the car does most of the work for you
- Greater fuel efficiency due to smoother gear changes
- Reduced wear and tear on car components
- Increased safety thanks to advanced autonomous driving technologies 
- Easier to operate for people with limited mobility or experience 
- Seamless integration with home and office automation systems
